snippet: A state law that restricts private health insurance coverage for abortions will go to trial to resolve whether it poses a substantial obstacle to women seeking an abortion, a federal judge ruled.
abstract: Federal Judge Julie A Robinson rules that Kansas state law that restricts private health insurance coverage for abortions will go to trial to resolve whether it poses a substantial obstacle to women seeking to end pregnancies.
lead_paragraph: A state law that restricts private health insurance coverage for abortions will go to trial to resolve whether it poses a substantial obstacle to women seeking an abortion, a federal judge ruled.

headline.main: Kansas: Request to Nullify Abortion Law Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Request To Nullify Abortion Law Is Rejected
